instruction: Compose a short song of 8 bars that follows a particular key.
output:
[Verse 1] 
G        G7      C         D
Oh, I'm livin' on the beach and it feels just right 
G        G7      G
The waves come in and all the stress fades away 
[Chorus] 
G          G7       C          D
Forget all my worries, take a breath and just sing 
G          G7       Em          D
Cuz this is the moment I'm really livin' in 
[Verse 2] 
G        G7       C          D
The sun's shinning through the clouds and I'm feeling alright 
G         G7      G 
Just let the sand between my toes give me a peaceful feeling 
[Chorus] 
G           G7       C          D
Forget all my worries, take a breath and just sing 
G           G7       Em          D
Cuz this is the moment I'm really livin' in 
[Outro] 
G        G7      C        D
Oh, I'm livin' on the beach and it feels just right 
G        G7       G
The waves come in and all the stress fades away.
